lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: Empowering the poor through sharing is an essential aspect of God's plan for human flourishing

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: I Love to help people accomplish their dreams because i know what it feels like to have people help me accomplish mine.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Money only buys happinness up to a certain point (approx. USD$10,000 per capita - read Bill McKibben's new book 'Deep Economy' for more info on this figure).  Most people in the western world have far surpassed that amount.  Instead of having money sitting in a bank in an effort to gain wealth, why not use it to make someone else's life a bit more happy?

lenders.name: Tom and Lorelei
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can! The Lord has blessed us and there are so many that need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: We build up families by caring, teaching and loving. In the name of Christ.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: a loan is needed.
lenders.occupational_info: Learning all I can in order to do as much as I can when I make my time come.

lenders.name: Matthew & Amanda
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach very young children how to become good people.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I've benefitted from loans in the past that have been very important to me. I'm happy to be in a position to be able to help make a difference by making important loans to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a large transportation company that moves goods all over the world. As the result, I'm lucky enough to have seen much of it.

lenders.name: Team Weldon
lenders.loan_because: Because everyone should be able to follow their dreams, and because we all need to be connected.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.occupational_info: I write software programs.

lenders.name: kathy
lenders.loan_because: I live Shelby, Michigan, a beautiful place,, i can help other people
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room and we have all the supplies and antibodics we need, i need to offer others assistance that have less.

lenders.name: James M
lenders.loan_because: I want to help folks in other places to be self-sufficient. I've had friends and family help me to get established in my career, so I would like to help others do the same. I am honored to get the chance to loan funds to others in this way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an attorney to help American soldiers who want to leave the military. I do this because I believe strongly in peace and believe that God wants us all to do what we can to make the world more peaceful.

lenders.name: Yasmein
lenders.loan_because: It's part of what I can do to put words into action.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I need a loan to fence my fruit farm and construct a water tank for harvesting rain water to be used in watering my trees during the dry season
lenders.occupational_info: My work involve growing grafted fruit trees like oranges,mangoes,avocados,bananas and pawpaws. Currently I have grafted 80 Mango trees and 65 Orange trees which I expect to mature to commercial production by year 2008.

lenders.name: CHARLES
lenders.loan_because: OUR SON AND DAUGHTER -IN -LAW GAVE MY WIFE AND I A GIFT CERTIFICATE TO KIVA.  AS WE LOOKED THROUGH THE FOLKS TO LEND TO WE BECAME EXTREMELY INTERESTED IN THEIR WORKS AND DREAMS.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I own and operate a bakery.

lenders.name: Lyzette
lenders.loan_because: One person can make a difference... and a difference is what we need.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: What is a small amount to us can make such a difference to someone in another country.  It\'s great also to see directly who the funds help and how they are used.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people from foreign countries who have come to the United States to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It might make a difference and I appreciate entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a small municipal government that provides services (police, fire, streets, sewer, water, and recreational ) to the citizens of Yreka, California.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed in this life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a firefighter paramedic in Kansas City, KS.  I respond to medical emergencies and firegrounds.  I try to help people when they need it.

lenders.name: Torsten
lenders.loan_because: It should be the nature of human beeings to help each other !!!! This idea which Kiva sets free is hopefully spreading the whole world and gives everybody a real chance to boost their lifes with good ideas .... I LOVE IT !!!! Thank`s KIVA !!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I do ethnical business help to establish the cultural creative economy with products from the world to the world and do my best to support fair trade and a lifestyle of health and sustainability ....

lenders.name: The Parkers
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate and want to help give a hand up
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to design, produce and promote the use of products that are needed in the medical community for diagnosing illnesses.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Oprah told me.
lenders.occupational_info: I add AND subtract.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I believe venture money is the best way to build an economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small startup high-tech companies incorporate and position themselves to raise venture capital.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: It works.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I saw an article in a Computer Technology education magazine and it mentioned Guatemala or Togo, two countries dear to my heart.  A great friend of mine just came back from medical mission work in Togo and my son was adopted from Guatemala.  When you see people trying so hard to better themselves, you want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help raise funds for my college through writing grants for government agencies or foundations.

lenders.name: Gary Bradhering-Chris Harris
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs some help at some point, and if we can, how can we not assist them?

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Annette & Tim
lenders.loan_because: We believe it can make a difference

lenders.name: gardner&naomi
lenders.loan_because: we\'d like to create a dual power to replace the corrupt power of capitalism!

lenders.name: Lars
lenders.loan_because: I feel very priviliged living in Denmark, and I would like to help people around the world improve their quality of life.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to create their own future.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money to help fund a university.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is important & needed. This works. I am glad to have a way to help these entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist, mainly a portrait artist. I work mostly in pencil. I add color with colored pencils & pastels. My portfolio is full of portraits of all different kinds of people: rich, poor, short, tall, quiet, boisterous, happy, confused, mischievous, dutiful... all great people in their own way.

lenders.name: Hannah & Madi
lenders.loan_because: Life is better when we help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: Hannah is a parent and teacher. Madi is one of Hannah's  wonderful daughters.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: A small act can have a large positive impact on another persons life.

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.loan_because: I love to see the smiles on people\'s faces. \r\n

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microfinance as a tool for eliminating poverty.

lenders.name: Cam
lenders.loan_because: There are people who need this money more than I ever could.  Hopefully my initial \"investment\" can turn into money that I can continue to lend to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix and maintain computers and electronics for an architecture business.

lenders.name: dan
lenders.loan_because: Guess I am an idealist.  I can complain about the way things are in the world, or I can do something.  I choose to do.

lenders.name: Human
lenders.loan_because: Human help human.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a human.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: It makes me very happy to loan money to enthusiastic and hard-working people. If we all work together to create a better world, with an attitude of surrender to God's will, then anything is possible. I especially hope and pray that children all over the world will have enough to eat, a nice place to live, and good teachers and schools.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I am studying software engineering. For several months out of each year, I work as a volunteer in the charitable projects of Amma, a saint and humanitarian from southern India. At other times, I drive a big truck across the USA and sometimes Canada.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to improve their lives in a sustainable way rather than giving them handouts that only help temporarily.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: I saw the story about Kiva on Front Line and I was struck by how far a small amount of money can go toward lifting someone out of poverty.  Addressing global poverty is very important to me and this seems to be a great way to be a part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info: During the week, I develop software for a huge American corporation.  On the weekends, I play drums for various local bands.

lenders.name: Frilly Lilly
lenders.occupation: We create Bath and Body Products
lenders.loan_because: Every business needs to start somewhere. Frilly Lilly believes in giving back and helping whenever possible. Kiva allows us to help small businesses and entrepreneurs all around the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
Since the launch of their new dessert-inspired product line in September of 2005, Frilly Lilly has become an instant sensation both in Calgary and abroad, as the line was quickly picked up by Fred Segal in Santa Monica, Kitson in Los Angeles, as well as The Palms and The Wynn hotels in Las Vegas!

Debra Van Dyke, the visionary behind Frilly Lilly, opened the beauty boutique initially specializing in waxing, manicures, and pedicures. It was her vision to create "a product that does all the right things when we’re doing services but also smells wonderful and looks great on the side of your tub.” It was this approach that guided the development of the entire Frilly Lilly body care line, says Debra, whose team worked for two fun years creating and testing the products, letting the clientele of Frilly Lilly's Calgary flagship store to be the first to try them out.

The result is the whimsical and feminine frilly lilly line, featuring sensational 'flavors' and vintage-inspired packaging. With an assortment of treats from bath bombs shaped and hand decorated as an assortment of petits fours and cupcakes to a variety of body butters, lotions, lip products, and a line of exciting nail polishes, all of the products are used in the spa services at frilly lilly!

Debra oversees the frilly lilly product line as well as the beauty boutique along side her two children, Lisa and Jeremy. The frilly lilly boutique has been recognized as one of the best places for waxing in Calgary, and in addition to carrying their own product line, also carry the latest trends in accessories fit for any fashionista.

With the brand quickly expanding in Canada, the United States, and soon to be worldwide, there hasn’t been a better time to indulge without ever gaining a pound!

lenders.name: Ethan
lenders.loan_because: I'm curious to see what happens. If this is successful I would consider loaning more. Also, why not encourage entrepenuership if it will do some good for people who otherwise might not have such an opportunity. Good luck!
lenders.occupational_info: My works is in the service industry. I provide travel related services like booking airlines, hotel and rental car reservations for corporate client around the world.

lenders.name: The Campbell Familly
lenders.loan_because: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail. (Emerson)
lenders.occupational_info: High School Student; Program Director; College Student; Customer Service Representative

lenders.loan_because: it just feels nice.

I marvel with admiration and humility to the resilient spirit of people who are courageous enough to embark on an entrepreneurial journey!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a novelist and my wife is a nurse :)

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: in memory of Christopher our beloved cat

lenders.name: BradleyT
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a silicon valley technology company.

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I think loans to start businesses are more effective and sustainable than handouts when trying to combat poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur in the financial services industry.

lenders.name: Redic
lenders.loan_because: I once owned a business. My venture was made possible by people who took a chance on me. This is a great way to pay their kindness forward and contribute to the success of others.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.  How lucky we are to be able to help empower others.
lenders.occupational_info: Musician/Entrepreneur

lenders.name: Pontiac UMC Jr. High
lenders.loan_because: We're using the Lord's gifts to help others

lenders.occupational_info: I work with architects and engineers to get construction permits from government offices.

lenders.loan_because: I like seeing money transformed into something valuable.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers to accelerate businesses.

lenders.name: Jeff

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people become independent.  I give Kiva Gift Certificates as gifts to friends and relatives on special occasions because I feel that it spreads the word on helping others.  I encourage you to use Kiva for gift giving.

lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and I believe in supporting women who are working to improve life for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women find ways to work smart  to support their businesses and family life.

lenders.loan_because: my family would like to help others.

lenders.name: vijay
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE IN NEED

lenders.name: Bregje Peys
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: James

lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs to start and grow technology companies.

lenders.name: Jimmy & Sindu
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to do our little part in helping others build their future.
lenders.occupational_info:
Sindu is a civil architect who works in Atlanta.

Jimmy is a software developer working in Atlanta.

lenders.name: Peter & Judy
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of helping those less fortunate than ourselves become autonomous through their own efforts, as well as the continuous process of helping others as loans are repaid.  When we learnt about Kiva we suggested our family consider a gift certificate for a loan instead of giving us Christmas gifts this year.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to help, and the results can be life changing for everyone involved.

lenders.name: JOHN
lenders.loan_because: WE DO NOT NEED BANKS ANYMORE

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Having traveled all over the world I realize how fortunate I am and how much there is that I can do to help.

lenders.loan_because: to create a link with some peoples in the world and to help if possible

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to, and it seems like a much more focussed way to aleviate poverty than simply giving money to wasteful NGOs.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the CEO of Carbon Planet, a company dedicated to reducing greenhouse gas emisisons through measurement (emissions audits), reduction strategies and properly certified carbon offsets. See http://www.carbonplanet.com for more on Carbon Planet.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: it's needed & I can do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in need in the U.S. to start businesses and earn a living wage.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I realize how fortunate I am, and I appreciate how hard working and entrepreneurial these individuals are. I would like to share some of what I have with others who can in turn make a difference in their own communities.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: having a business allows one to feel good about oneself while supporting one's family.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science and math to students aged 11-14.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the best sustainable ways to end poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying International Affairs. Id also like to be a paramedic.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.loan_because: Christ is Beautiful, and helping others pleases The Beautiful One, which brings me joy. (The avatar is artist He Qi's "Escape Into Egypt")

lenders.name: carlos
lenders.loan_because: helps people, well i'm indonesian.
lenders.occupational_info: making internet works

lenders.name: Adam Brankamp
lenders.loan_because: It's my small way of encouraging the entrepreneurial spirit of people who need it the most. I love being able to participate from thousands of miles away. Hopefully someday day I'll be able to help out in person.

lenders.name: Jason & Jacquie
lenders.loan_because: We believe that if everyone plays a small part communities can come together to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: just trying to make the world a better place man
lenders.occupational_info: i like to sleep,eat and chase cats mainly

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea helping a specific person improve their lives, and lives of those around them. That they are getting loans, and not handouts, greatly increases the prospect that these entrepreneurs lives will improve for the long term.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people help themselves & may God bless their endeavors.
lenders.occupational_info: Give direction to a team of folks who do amazing work creating software applications.

lenders.name: Rayn
lenders.loan_because: I feel that so much donated money gets lost in processing. I am trying this out because it looks like a great way to create sustainability and improve the businesses and lives of families around the world who are working hard.  Together we can work towards advantaging all while disadvantaging none.  The more money I put in this system the more I can help and keep helping as it keeps coming back.  I feel the interest paid on an investment like this  is far more valuable for our world in the long run than more money coming back to me than I put in.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix the computers for a few hundred people and make sure that everyone is happy and can do their jobs efficiently while also teaching them how to use them better.  I have always been drawn to helping people but I have learned to love the idea of helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I help graduates of an art school find work in their field.

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my babies - any woman in any part of the world knows what this is about.

lenders.loan_because: I like to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in sales- I have a number of companies that I sell our product to and I service these stores over the phone. These companies are usually small family owned businesses.

lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for everything I have in my life and want to make a difference in the lives of others while they pursue their dreams.

lenders.name: jd
lenders.loan_because: microfinance is effective way to relieve suffering and reduce poverty.

I think that lending money is the best way to help another person improve their quality of life while keeping their dignity intact.  They are then able to help themselves and their families as well as their communities.  How cool is that?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a visual arts and French secondary school teacher.

lenders.occupational_info: Increase international understanding between people in the US and Macedonia, and work to create sustainable and positive development in Macedonia.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: When we care for others that we do not know - we give Hope. They nurture that Hope and it grows.
lenders.occupational_info: To do the best I can with what I have.

lenders.name: Anjoum
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in need in an effective way.  If we just gave needy people supplies they wouldn't know how to obtain them when the supply runs out.  Kiva donates money to them to start up their bussiness.  That is why I support kiva

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I care about the communities in which I work. The mining industry is often portrayed as greedy and exploitative. My personal experience is that the mining industry is comprised of individual people with big hearts who truly care about the people, communities, and environment around us.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a geologist for a mining company operating in Latin America. I have also worked in socially and environmentally responsible mines in Australia and Tanzania and have seen the benefits of mining in these communities.

lenders.name: Patt & James
lenders.occupational_info: We both work for nonprofits that benefit children.

lenders.name: Florence
lenders.loan_because: It's one tiny step I can make as an individual towards creating a more egalitarian world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher, now trying to "give back" by helping teacher candidates learn their craft and get their teaching credentials.

lenders.name: Stefano
lenders.loan_because: I believe that sustainable development, encouraged by microfinancing, is an important means towards the eradication of poverty.

lenders.name: Mark

lenders.occupational_info: I work in advertising. Which is basically the job of convincing people to buy a product or purchace a service through print and TV advertisments.

lenders.name: Helen

lenders.loan_because: We want to share the opportunities and blessings we have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family of five, 3 children ages 20, 18 and 14.  Dad is an engineer, Mom is an educator, our oldest son and daughter are in college and our youngest daughter is starting high school. Our daughters gave us the money and Kiva web address as a Christmas gift, so that we could make this loan.

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: If you have the means to help others and choose not to then what good are you?

lenders.name: Ajay

lenders.name: Tina&Thomas

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I have a auto repair and towing business

lenders.name: Patrick

lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student in Computer Science, and I\\\'m getting my education so I can in turn teach others as a professor(teacher) myself.

lenders.name: Allison

lenders.name: LLCC International Club
lenders.loan_because: We believe in change

lenders.name: gabriella

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the vault at a casino.

lenders.name: Western Illinois Univ

lenders.occupational_info: We are a student organization interested in all areas of finance.

lenders.name: Amy P
lenders.loan_because: I love that you can watch the progress of the person you loan to and when its repaid you can help someone else!

lenders.name: Hannan

lenders.name: Fizzy
lenders.loan_because: I love watching hardworking people succeed.

lenders.name: scott

lenders.occupational_info: building businesses and teaching others how to do so.

lenders.name: Nora
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of the world community..one who can help in a small way, to have a chance to change the life of others.

lenders.name: Jason

lenders.occupational_info: I plan and manage international projects and programs for organizations who work in developing nations.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I think everybody should have an opportunity to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Michael

The ability to support a loving family, do something meaningful with their lives and make a difference in the world.\r\nWho would not want to offer a tiny bit of my income to provide the opportunity for them.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I cannot afford not to.

lenders.name: Rita, Tom & Family
lenders.loan_because: As a family, we have enough and are able to share with others that must provide for their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Tom and I are retired. In my profession, I worked with refugee & immigrants who were resettled in our State. My husband was a masonry contractor who built with brick, block, stone and river rock.

lenders.name: Saul
lenders.loan_because: It\'s the life blood of any entrepreneur, being an investor.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple thing to do, and it might help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers.  I program them, fix them, build them.  I am studying to be a shaman, which does not explain the African garb in my picture:  my colleagues asked me to wear it for a party.

lenders.name: david
lenders.loan_because: I thank Kiva for putting all the pieces together and delivering help. I wish you continued success. Thanks again.

lenders.name: Tom

lenders.occupational_info: University student and volunteer county Sheriff.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm in school

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe that I as a US citizen can have a positive impact on the welfare of  other people world-wide who otherwise have limited access to credit, and by loaning them the needed capital, allow their businesses to succeed! It often makes my day when enough funds are repaid so that I can then  re-lend my funds to a new person or group, and then follow their progress afterwards!

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I'm delighted to help another small businessperson succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I offer secretarial and bookkeeping services to other small businesses in my town at their place of business, out of my home office, or across the internet.  I also have a "cottage craft" business of making cards and calendars out of my own photography.

lenders.name: Jenny and Brian

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to imporve their lives.

lenders.name: Nancy

lenders.loan_because: Pretty simple...a little goes a long way.  What equals a nice dinner for many of us equals a life changing catalyst for others.  If you could facilitate that kind of change with so little why wouldn\'t you???????
lenders.occupational_info: I work with technology startups in Silicon Valley to help them launch and grow their business.  I love helping entrepreneurs succeed.  Kiva entrepreneurs need MUCH less money for MUCH more direct impact with less hand holding than a SV startup :)

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: Getting investment capital to motivated people is a great way to break the cycle of generational poverty.

lenders.name: Kirkwood

lenders.occupational_info:
SIFE is a global non-profit organization active in more than 40 countries. SIFE is funded by financial contributions from corporations, entrepreneurs, foundations, government agencies and individuals. Working in partnership with business and higher education, SIFE establishes student teams on university campuses. These teams are led by faculty advisors and they are challenged to develop community outreach projects that reach SIFE's five educational topics:

Market Economics 
Success Skills 
Entrepreneurship 
Financial Literacy 
Business Ethics

lenders.name: Figota Enterprises
lenders.loan_because: We believe that the spirit of Entrepreneurship should be kept alive on a Global scale.

lenders.name: Dave

lenders.name: Yemisrach
lenders.loan_because: the greatest social service that can be render by anybody to the country and to mankind is to bring up a family...by George Bernard Shaw.  I yearn to be trapped in humanity by helping others bring up their family. And most of all, I know that they will use the money more wisely than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an engineer in a Biotech/Diagnostic company in discovery, development, production and marketing of novel health care diagnostic medical devices and solutions.  And also, working closely with Kiva in exploring opportunities to establish Kiva partnership in Ethiopia.

I am so lucky the least I can do is help someone else.

lenders.occupational_info: We do various projects to  help make this community one of peace, justice and love and to bring peace, justice and love to the surrounding community and world.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help others whenever I can.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a law student at UC Davis, uncertain of what type of law I will practice but hopeful that I will be able to help people.

lenders.name: Laurine
lenders.loan_because: I have two small businesses of my own and I know how difficult it is to deal with regular banks in that situation. I want to help other people who can\'t get a bank loan! I like knowing something about the people to whose businesses I am contributing.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a senior citizen who has been disabled with chronic illness for about 30 years. I have a company that manages the administrative work of my husband\\\\\\\'s consulting business. Together we raise little white dogs called Bichon Bolognese.

lenders.name: Al W
lenders.loan_because: It\\\'s a great way to get \\\"directly\\\" involved.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I believe I am called by Christ to be an advocate for social justice, and this is one way to do that.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I\\\'m teaching a social-justice curriculum, and my class and I want to experience firsthand the power of one small act of kindness -- in this case, lending a small amount of money in the hopes that it will help make a better life for someone in need.

lenders.name: Manuel
lenders.loan_because: I work in Microfinance and I understand first hand the impact that these seemingly small loans can have on someone's business and life.

lenders.name: XNet
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other entrepreneurs across the globe to have an opportunity to make themselves successful.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a business to business Internet provider. We are success driven entrepreneurs, just like these people below. But in a different place, with a different face.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in development finance in banks that are part of an international group which specialize in financial services for micro, small and medium-size enterprises.

lenders.name: Sean

lenders.loan_because: I am a mom and I have spent many years giving to my family. It is time for me to give to others like me who work hard for their families and their communities...
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children who have special challenges in the classroom (special education teacher).

lenders.name: Sociology 362
lenders.loan_because: Sociology 362 (Spring 2007) was a class that studied globalization, and microfinance shows the positive side of globalization.
lenders.occupational_info: The University of San Diego is a Catholic post-secondary educational institution that places an emphasis on "values based" education.

lenders.name: vincent
lenders.loan_because: I loan because i want make difference through loan,i can make difference with little things,and other peoples can make a difference with little they have,
lenders.occupational_info: i am very polite ,truthfull and caring person,i always beleive that together we can make difference,because ,Iron sharpeneth Iron.

lenders.name: Waters Family
lenders.loan_because: The money we may lose would not change my life style, but that same money will help change someone else’s life style.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the computer field and my wife works in the corporate tax field.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I like the beauty of empowering people instead of just handing them something that can help them for a few minutes.  Kiva loans allow them to take what we loan them and make something lasting for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I hope that my work helps others love their work more.

lenders.name: TIES
lenders.loan_because: we realized that helping those who wish to better themselves, and their local area, by working smarter is the most effective way of evening the global economy.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a student run technological and entrepreneurial organization at the University of Missouri - Rolla.  We gather weekly to fullfil our needs to be enthusiastic about business ventures and new products and ideas.  Our group advisor saw a T.V. show on KIVA one day and suggested that we, as a group, give to one of KIVA\\\'s hopefuls.  The group quickly accepted this as a wonderful idea and within the month we have sent out two $25 loans.  Once these return (we are very optomistic) we will immediately reinvest an increased amount.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: I saw the Kiva Organization mission on my center for public television channel and I felt compelled!

lenders.name: Anushka

lenders.loan_because: Economic empowerment opportunity that it makes available for others and rewards my cause, at the same time. I am blessed to be a blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: Recycling resources to benefit the good of ALL humankind.  Eco Friendly Consultant.

lenders.name: Timothy R. Yee
lenders.loan_because: I believe in corporate responsibility and doing our best to end the cycle of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Socially responsible investing: I help individuals and businesses formulate sound investments that reflect their values.

lenders.name: Derrick
lenders.loan_because: My Grandparents taught me it is better to give than receive, I am forever hooked on this way of living!

lenders.loan_because: The Lawyer's Council for Social Justice is a group of law students looking to make a difference early in our legal careers.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying Law

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: i love helping others help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I manufacture greenhouse kits and sell flowers at local farmers markets .The nursery business has been very good to me.

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: I think this site is awesome. You can keep on making a difference over and over again.  Even if it is small at least it is something.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain my company's network infrastructure.

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people everywhere reach their potential. I like knowing that all the money I give will be used to help someone reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with large companies to help them put their advertisements in magazines, tv, internet, and other places

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe that most people just need a chance that social and economic forces prevent them from having.  I know that individuals can make a great difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization that helps nonprofit organizations that work with children under 5 and their families.  I help the organizations show the effects they have and learn to do things better.

lenders.name: Sydney
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves an opportunity.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can; not many have the privilege.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell books and magazines to support my education, as well as selling tickets to a circus.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others and I am fortunate enough to have the ability to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on developing new medicines for untreated diseases.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Evan
lenders.loan_because: I help those in need financially even though I am in financial need
lenders.occupational_info: to teach languages/cultures to several areas of the world is a goal I am aiming for

lenders.name: Maryanne
lenders.loan_because: In 1994 I was working in another industry when I was laid off in a corporate merger.  I ended up having to change careers and needed $600. to go back to school to finish the real estate classes I needed to obtain my Appraisal License. For me, at that time in my life, $600 was a real deal breaker.  Because someone had faith in me and helped me many years ago by making that loan, I am in a position to help someone else today.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a licensed real estate appraiser in the State of Arizona.  I do residential real estate appraisal and own my own business.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: Solidarity will make a change.
lenders.occupational_info: Happiness

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I have the luck to live in a secure and rich country, this is the minimum that I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a corporate library, I buy scientific e-books and databases, I search for interesting informations for our business (chemistry).

lenders.name: Danijel
lenders.loan_because: I really believe that small gestures of generosity can change somebody\'s life out there, somewhere far from me, who does not  get to enjoy the same luxury and the same meaningless scale of problems that I do. While I get to worry about things like work stress or small arguments, other people worry about having something to eat or feed their family with. So here is to making a world a bit of a happier place for some of them...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in one of the biggest consumer goods corporations in the world, in charge of managing several products with my team for an entire region in Europe. It\'s a stressful, but very fulfilling work... And I am happy to share a small fruit of that labor with those that don\\\'t get the opportunity to reap such fruits.

lenders.name: Octavio
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work.

lenders.name: michaela
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the chance, at bare minimum, to be self-sufficient. I would hope if I was in need someone would help me. A lot of life is luck. The rest is hard work. I've been lucky. I am grateful for that. And with that gratitude comes a desire to give back and "pay it forward." I admire all these people who are working so hard and trying to make their dreams come true against trying odds. I loan because... we are all connected and if someone on the other side of the planet can better their life, we are all better.

lenders.name: Everett
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because:
http://hospitalityapartments.blogspot.com/

      Iris E. Mayo
